Test Name: Second-line Drug Susceptibility Testing for Mycobacterium tuberculosis Complex (MTBC)
Specimen Type: Sputum or bronchial lavage (other appropriate respiratory specimens)
Purpose: To determine the susceptibility of MTBC isolates to second-line antituberculosis drugs for guiding therapy in MDR-TB and XDR-TB cases.
